resources.string: Let AutoNavi help apps get location data. This means sending anonymous location data to AutoNavi. This service may generate network traffic.
To work properly, this service requires additional permissions. Please allow permissions when asked.
To work properly, this service needs to access your storage. Please allow permission when asked.
To work properly, this service needs to access your location. Please allow permission when asked.
To work properly, this service needs to access your Phone. Please allow permission when asked.
"To work properly, this service requires additional permissions. You can manage Network Location's permissions in Settings"
"To work properly, this servic needs to access your Location. You can manage Network Location's permissions in Settings."
"To work properly, this servic needs to access your Phone. You can manage Network Location's permissions in Settings."
"To work properly, this service needs to access your storage. You can manage Network Location's permissions in Settings."
